member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:FurnitureDelivery.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:FurnitureDelivery.Controllers.CustomerProfilesController.PutCustomerProfile(System.String,FurnitureDelivery.Models.CustomerProfile)
member.summary: Method (PUT) to update CustomerProfile record. All profile properties put will rewrite. We can also manipulate the addresses connected to user. If address record doesn't have {id} or id is unknown then method unbind old address and connect the new one
member.param: {CustomerProfile JSON} Customer profile object with properties filled
